_comment: Session-level defaults. CLI flags override these values.
_comment_model: Set to true if your LLM emits <tool_call> tags natively. Set to false to force the text parser. Omit (or set to null) for hybrid auto-detect (recommended).
_comment_elevation: If true, tools in the whitelist below skip the per-call UAC prompt. WARNING: only whitelist tools you trust to run as admin.
